headline: Why The Narrative Around Cardinal Health (CAH) Is Shifting With Fresh Targets And Fair Value Assumptions
summary: The fair value estimate for Cardinal Health has shifted from about US$230.27 to roughly US$243.07 per share, reflecting updated assumptions that use a slightly higher discount rate and a lower revenue growth outlook. Even with that softer growth assumption, recent analyst commentary around guidance, specialty expansion, and core distribution resilience has supported a higher price target. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these moving assumptions and the evolving narrative around...

headline: BD Merges Biosciences & Diagnostics Business With Waters
summary: BDX completes its Biosciences & Diagnostic spin-off and Waters merger, securing $4B in proceeds as it pivots to a pure-play MedTech focus.
